Struct wich contains fft noise module options

Member Data Documentation

float Hydrax::Noise::FFT::FFT::Options::Amplitude

Noise amplitude.

float Hydrax::Noise::FFT::FFT::Options::AnimationSpeed

Animation speed.

Ogre::Vector3 Hydrax::Noise::FFT::FFT::Options::GPU_LODParameters

LOD Parameters, in order to obtain a smooth normal map we need to decrease the detail level when the pixel is far to the camera. This parameters are stored in an Ogre::Vector3: x -> Initial LOD value (Bigger values -> less detail) y -> Final LOD value z -> Final distance

float Hydrax::Noise::FFT::FFT::Options::GPU_Strength

Representes the strength of the normals (i.e. Amplitude).

GPU Normal map generator parameters Only if GPU normal map generation is active

float Hydrax::Noise::FFT::FFT::Options::KwPower
